contact_info.hours: Monday through Friday from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. EST

steps.description: Check to make sure the mailing address above is correct. Print any corrections in the box below on the right. Any corrections must match your ID.
Your signature and date of birth are required to determine your eligibility.
Attach a copy of your identification.
Send form and copy of ID in the enclosed self-addressed envelope or mail to: 522723285 Attn Consumer Relations P.O. Box 2959 Winston-Salem NC 27102

certification.statement: I certify that I am a smoker: am 21 years of age or older; and that I want to receive offers, premiums, coupons, or cigarettes that may be sent to me in the mail. I understand that giving false information in order to accept these offers may constitute a violation of law.
certification.note: COPYING SOME FORMS OF OFFICIAL ID IS ILLEGAL IN SOME STATES. PLEASE MAKE SURE THE ID YOU COPY COMPLIES.

offer_restriction: Offer Restricted to Smokers 21 Years of Age or Older.
